0: Rooms might definitely use some refurbishing
There were a couple of tour groups staying there during our visitThe carpets in the hotel are old stained and worn but clean throughout the halls and in the rooms

In my 48hrs there I do not think I saw one member of staff smileThe rooms are well equipped but come with huge pillows great when propped up watching TV but when you lay down and rest your head on them to sleep your feet hang off the end of the bed as the pillow takes up at a quarter of the length and I am only of average height I pity tall people trying to sleep here
The bedroom was outdated and grotty
I guess if they just improve this and provide tea coffee maker in the room they would be able to attract a much higher price for the rooms
Filthy and old rooms without no wifi
I would suggest to the management to simple repaint the doors and put a more design like mirror and paintings in the tom which will upgrade them to a four star rated room
Was upgraded to business room but the rooms was very small
when i notified manager he came to apologize but the responsible room service attendant said not my fault which is a bit shocking
The room I stayed in looked old and small
1: First of all when we arrived in the hotel we stored my friends medicine in the refrigerator

great view close to public transport and close to picturesque city centerOnly spent two nights there but very good service and very helpful forgot something in the room after checking out and the pick up afterwards worked out excellently
The room is clean and nice the remote did not work properly
Otherwise good location polite staff and nice rooms but the warmth in the rooms ruins a good nights sleep therefore only 25
loved the breakfast also the total decoration of the hotel rooms bar and restaurant was modern and perfect
The bathroom has separate bathtub and shower which is a plus
We had a nice view on the river and the bed was very comfortable
Nice view out off The window
I have ordered the superior room as the entrance to the Spa is free to for the Superior guests
We have stayed for 3 nights in Superior room
